translations: 耽搁，延迟；等待；逗留（tarry 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: He was asked why he had "tarried away so many months".
sentences.translation: 有人问他为什么“去了几个月不回来”。

sentences.sentence: O good sir, peradventure you mean the ragged regal vagrant that tarried here the night.
sentences.translation: 哦，好先生，也许您指的是那个衣衫褴褛、在这儿过夜的皇家流浪汉吧。

sentences.sentence: I wonder why he tarried so long.
sentences.translation: 我不明白他为什么耽搁那么久。
